Global

Methods

fastRand(min, max, setsize)

Generates a function that returns a faster random number generator, but which has a setup cost. If you're using a very large number of random numbers, this is significantly faster. http://jsperf.com/precalc-random-numbers e.g. var nextRand = rnd.fastRand(1, 10); // The slow bit var n = nextRand(); // The fast bit
Parameters:
Name Type Description
min Lowest possible value
max Highest possible value
setsize Number Optional. The number of values to precalculate.
Source:
  • util/rnd.js, line 56
